gui

Class Pet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Pet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cat, Cow, Dog, Rabbit, Rat, Velociraptor

    public class Pet
extends java.lang.Object
    The Pet Class. All of the indivual pets inherit from this class. We have this so we can have everything in the same lists.
